text: Þis beth þe landmere to stoure þare thritti hide.
Erest op of stoure on trildoune vppe tril on landscher ford ouer þane ford bi merehale on Conibrok of þan brok bi merehawe on wadeleighe northward on stanwey.
Of stanweie bi merehawe on deuelisch.

Of defelich on stut þare on vppe stut on þar dich southward be dich ouer sanddoune on filithleighe þanen on Holambrok of þan brok on <hedemchil> þanen on Lideman bi lidenan on stoure on þan olde wested vp on stoure on þer dich be dich on litegesheued.
Of lutegesheued bi groue on minnanlinche þanen north bi heuede þanen est to hedeswelle.
Þanen bi sixe acres north an heued on þare þorn rewe þanen on sand mor of þan more on smeryate by seuergate eft on stoure.
